original_text: and all the villages around these towns as far as Baalath. These were their settlements. And they kept a genealogical record.
korean_text: 또 모든 성읍 주위에 살던 주민들의 경계가 바알까지 다다랐으니 시므온 자손의 거주지가 이러하고 각기 계보가 있더라

sentences.original_text: and all the villages around these towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 성읍들을 둘러싼 모든 촌락들

sentences.original_text: And they kept a genealogical record
